content: Mi ha detto che vuole vincere.
translations: eng:He has told me he wants to win
eng:He told me he wants to win
eng:He told me that he wants to win
eng:She has told me she wants to win
eng:She told me she wants to win
eng:She told me that she wants to win
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
